mesquite.lib.duties

Interface CellColorer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnnotPanel, CharGroupColor, ColorByAA, ColorByCharValue, ColorByExcluded, ColorByFootnote, ColorByMatchToFirstTaxon, ColorByNumber, ColorByState, ColorByTaxonValue, ColorCells, ColorForAlignment, ColorGapsInCodingSequence, ColorMisaligned, ColorOddAAs, ColorTInfo, NoColor, TaxonGroupColor

    public interface CellColorer
    This interface says that a module will color the cells of a character matrix.
